algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by taking the element-wise product of the squared rest capacity of the bin and the logarithm of the item size, then dividing it by the maximum bin capacity, and finally subtracting the logarithm of the sum of the rest capacities of all the bins.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    rest_capacity = max_capacity - bins
    rest_capacity_sum = np.sum(rest_capacity)
    scores = (np.square(rest_capacity) * np.log(item)) / max_capacity - np.log(rest_capacity_sum)
    return scores
